amendment.description: To make available $2,000,000 for non-thermal imaging systems.

vote.text: Amendment SA 787 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 787 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Santorum. (consideration: CR S6894-6895; text as modified: CR S6894) To make available $2,000,000 for non-thermal imaging systems.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 787 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 787 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Santorum.
